scenes.background: After agreeing to take a quick look at the urgent task, you find yourself needing to communicate with [Monica] and [Bob] over a video call to discuss the details. The task is more complicated than initially thought.
scenes.description: [Monica] leans back in her chair, looking slightly frustrated, 'We really need this to be done perfectly. Can you handle it or should we look for alternatives?'

options.text: I'll do my best with the time I have.
options.analysis: You aim for a balanced response, showing good social skills but possibly lacking in motivation and self-regulation.

options.text: I think it's best if someone else takes over from here.
options.analysis: You prioritize emotional perception and empathy, but your willingness to engage further might be questioned.

options.text: Let's try to work through it together for a bit longer.
options.analysis: You show a desire to collaborate and stay motivated, although your social skill could be better.
